skills.name: Acrobatics
skills.description: Your agility allows you to perform flips, rolls, and maintain balance in tricky situations.

skills.name: Animal Handling
skills.description: You have a natural ability to understand and calm animals, aiding in training or taming them.

skills.name: Arcana
skills.description: Your knowledge of magic, spells, and arcane lore allows you to understand mystical forces.

skills.name: Athletics
skills.description: You excel in physical endeavors such as climbing, swimming, and jumping.

skills.name: Deception
skills.description: You are skilled at convincing others of falsehoods, whether through lying or misdirection.

skills.name: History
skills.description: Your knowledge of historical events, ancient kingdoms, and important figures is vast.

skills.name: Insight
skills.description: You can read people and situations, detecting lies or discerning hidden motives.

skills.name: Intimidation
skills.description: Your forceful presence allows you to coerce or frighten others into compliance.

skills.name: Investigation
skills.description: You excel at finding clues, analyzing evidence, and piecing together mysteries.

skills.name: Medicine
skills.description: You understand anatomy and medical practices, helping you diagnose and treat injuries or illnesses.

skills.name: Nature
skills.description: You have knowledge of the natural world, including plants, animals, and ecosystems.

skills.name: Perception
skills.description: Your keen senses allow you to notice hidden details, sounds, or movements others might miss.

skills.name: Performance
skills.description: You have a talent for captivating an audience through music, acting, or storytelling.

skills.name: Persuasion
skills.description: You excel at influencing others with charm, diplomacy, or reasoned arguments.

skills.name: Religion
skills.description: Your understanding of deities, religious traditions, and spiritual practices is deep.

skills.name: Sleight of Hand
skills.description: You are skilled in subtle hand movements, such as picking pockets or performing magic tricks.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: You are adept at remaining unseen and moving silently in order to avoid detection.

skills.name: Survival
skills.description: You are skilled at tracking, foraging, and enduring harsh wilderness conditions.
